mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, PLAN_ID as planId, SUBJECT, SUMMARY, CREATE_TIME as createTime, HIT FROM PLAN WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId}

SELECT A.CONTENT_ID AS contentId, imageURL,title, addr1, addr2,latitude, longitude, likeCount, START_TIME AS startTime, END_TIME AS endTime FROM (SELECT * FROM PLAN_ATTRACTIONS WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId} ORDER BY ATTRACTION_ORDER ASC) AS A
JOIN
(SELECT B.CONTENT_ID as contentID, FIRST_IMAGE as imageURL, TITLE, ADDR1, ADDR2, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, IFNULL(CNT_TB.CI, 0) as likeCount FROM ATTRACTION_INFO AS B LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(CONTENT_ID) AS CNT, CONTENT_ID AS CI FROM USER_ATTRACTION_LIKE GROUP BY CONTENT_ID) AS CNT_TB ON B.CONTENT_ID = CNT_TB.CI) AS INFOS
ON A.CONTENT_ID = INFOS.CONTENTID
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) AS CNT FROM USER_PLAN_LIKE WHERE PLAN_ID_LIKE = #{planId}
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) AS CNT FROM USER_PLAN_LIKE WHERE USER_ID_LIKE = #{userId} AND PLAN_ID_LIKE = #{planId}
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) AS CNT FROM USER_PLAN_BOOKMARK WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PLAN_ID = #{planId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAN(USER_ID, SUBJECT, SUMMARY, CREATE_TIME) VALUES (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{summary}, NOW())

INSERT INTO PLAN_ATTRACTIONS(PLAN_ID, CONTENT_ID, ATTRACTION_ORDER, START_TIME, END_TIME) VALUES
(#{planId}, #{item.contentId}, #{index}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE PLAN SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE PLAN_ID = #{plan_id}
